def_cn: 英语字母表的第24个字母
def_en: X is the twenty-fourth letter of the English alphabet.

def_cn: （用于度量单位间）表示“乘以”
def_en: When writing down the size of something, you can use x in between the measurements to mean 'by'.

def_cn: （用于表示不知道或不愿透露的人名）某，X
def_en: X can be used to represent the name of a person when you do not know their real name, or when you are trying to keep their real name a secret.

def_cn: （用于表示不确定或无需指明的数量）
def_en: You can use X or x to refer to a number or amount when you do not know exactly how much it is, or when this information is not important.

def_cn: （用于书信或书面留言末尾，表示亲吻）
def_en: x is used to represent a kiss at the end of a letter or written message.

def_cn: （用于在地图上标明确切方位）
def_en: People sometimes write X on a map to mark a precise position that they want to refer to.
